summary:
USER_CONTEXT: Fix FITSDiff false positives when comparing identical FITS files with VLA (variable-length array) columns

TASK_TRACKING: 
COMPLETED: 
- Analyzed problem: FITSDiff incorrectly reports differences in VLA columns even when comparing identical files
- Located relevant code in /tmp/tmpvq5i4eh4/astropy/astropy/io/fits/diff.py
- Found TableDataDiff class (line 1227) that handles table data comparison
- Identified VLA comparison logic in _diff method (lines 1452-1460) using "P" format detection

PENDING: 
- Build astropy extensions to enable testing
- Understand VLA data structure and _VLF class implementation
- Identify root cause of comparison issue in VLA handling
- Implement fix for VLA comparison logic
- Create test cases to verify fix
- Submit solution

CURRENT_STATE: 
- Working directory: /tmp/tmpvq5i4eh4/astropy
- Cannot run astropy due to missing compiled extensions
- Found key code section: TableDataDiff._diff() method handles VLA columns with "P" format check
- VLA comparison uses np.allclose() on arra[idx] vs arrb[idx] for each row

CODE_STATE: 
- File: astropy/io/fits/diff.py, TableDataDiff class at line 1227
- Key method: _diff() starting at line 1344
- VLA handling: lines 1452-1460 with "P" in col.format condition
- Related files: astropy/io/fits/fitsrec.py (VLA data loading)
